mapper.select: SELECT PostID, Type, InsertUserName, body, Tags, CountComments, CountBookmarks, CountViews, Closed, IsBroadcast, DateInserted, DateUpdated, isActive FROM POST WHERE POSTID = #{PostID}
mapper.insert: INSERT into Post (InsertUserName, body, Tags, CountComments, CountBookmarks, CountViews, Closed, IsBroadcast, DateInserted,DateUpdated, isActive) VALUES (#{insertUserName},#{body},#{tags}, #{countComments}, #{countBookmarks}, #{countViews}, #{closed},#{isBroadcast}, #{dateInserted}, #{dateUpdated}, #{isActive})

INSERT into PostTag(PostID, TagName, CreateTime) VALUES
(#{PostTag.postID}, #{PostTag.tagName}, #{PostTag.createTime})
